Docs.summary: Defines a method for adding the part of XML Paper Specification (XPS) to an XPS package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Per ulteriori informazioni sul `DocumentStructure` elemento di un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] del pacchetto, vedere il capitolo 9 nel [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specifica, in cui è possibile ottenere in [XPS: specifica e Scarica licenza](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsStructure AddDocumentStructure() cil managed

Docs.summary: Adds the part of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package.
Docs.returns: An that represents the part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package.
